GoTo(String)

Takes you to anywhere in the app.

URL Examples:

Default screen in scene: appURL = 'scene'

Show a specific screen: appURL = 'scene/screen'

Show model infomation: appURL = 'scene/screen/model-id'

Declaration
public static void GoTo(string appURL)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String appURL

URL to location in app
